reference.shortdesc: A title hint provides information to map authors about the title of the referenced resource. This is useful if the referenced resources are not available.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: The titlehint element is a convenience element. It is equivalent to a titlealt element with title-role set to hint.

section.title: Processing expectations
section.p: Processing expectations are dictated by the rules for the titlealt element.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The titlehint element is specialized from titlealt. It is defined in the alternative-titles domain module.

section.title: Attributes
section.p: The following attributes are available on this element: and title-role.
For this element, title-role has a default value of hint.
